name: ONSLAUGHT (itch) (Sammenspiel)
description:
Controls:
Move - WASD
Slow Down - LShift
Shoot - Left Click (Hold)
==============================
ONSLAUGHT

You must survive the onslaught! Defeating enemies makes you grow stronger, but more of them will come. Enemies have a small chance to drop health... grab it before it floats away!

Game created for Mini Jam #124
Theme: Warmth
Limitation: Your score serves a purpose

Music - Juhani Junkala
